scripts.upload: npm run build && tar -a -c -f index.zip dist/ && aws s3 cp index.zip s3://code-zips-bucket-development/updateWorkflow.zip
scripts.deploy: npm run upload && aws lambda update-function-code --s3-bucket code-zips-bucket-development --s3-key updateWorkflow.zip --function-name api-updateWorkflow--region eu-west-1
